Claim: "Giving 10% of your income to the Church will free a child's soul from Limbo into Heaven."
Implication: "You should give your money to the Church."
Referring expressions: Your income, church, child's soul, limbo, heaven  Your money, church
Formula: (exists c (exists e (exists b (exists a ((IsGiven(b,a) and IsInLimbo(c)) and IsInHeaven(e)))))) -> (exists f (exists a (IsGiven(f,a))))
